All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bishop
Represents a Bishop piece.
CastlingRights
Represents the castling rights of both players in a chess game.
Color
Represents the color of a chess piece.
Coordinate
Represents a coordinate on a chessboard.
FenParser
This class is a static utility class for parsing FEN strings.
File
Represents the files on a chessboard.
Game
A record representing a game of chess.
King
Represents a King piece.
Knight
Represents a Knight piece in chess.
Move
This class encapsulates the details of a move on a chessboard, including the origin and destination squares, the type of move (such as normal, castling, en passant, or promotion), and the piece to promote to (if applicable).
MoveGenerator
This class is a static utility class for generating and getting the legal moves of a position.
Moves
This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return Moves.
MoveType
Represents the various types of moves in a position
Offset
Represents an offset on a chessboard.
Pawn
Represents a Pawn piece in chess.
PgnDatabaseSplitter
An Iterator and Iterable for reading individual games from a PGN (Portable Game Notation) file.
PgnParser
This class is a static utility class for parsing PGN strings representing a single game of Chess.
Piece
Represents a chess piece.
Pieces
This class consists of a single static member, Pieces.PROMOTION_CANDIDATES.
Position
Represents a chess position, including the arrangement of pieces on the board, castling rights, active color, en passant target square, halfmove clock, and fullmove number.
PositionBuilder
A mutable builder class for constructing Position instances programmatically.
Positions
A utility class providing static methods for analyzing chess Position states.
PositionValidator
Provides utilities for validating the legality of a given chess Position.
PositionValidator.Legality
An enum representing the various outcomes of a legality test of a Position
PromotionCandidate
Any classes with this annotation are put on the list of possible promotion pieces.
Queen
Represents a Queen piece in chess.
Rank
Represents the ranks on a chessboard.
Rider
Abstract class representing a piece in chess that consistently moves along an offset.
Rook
Represents a Rook piece in chess.
SanParser
A utility class for parsing Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) strings into Move objects.
Square
Represents a single square on a standard 8x8 chessboard.
